timeline.message: Don't convert DescriptorLanguage to something weird, use function instead of map

timeline.bodyText: This is a broader question, beyond the scope of this, but I think the default name should be something like "untitled.yml"... If I'm writing a real hosted workflow, which I've never done, I'd probably name it after its functionality, e.g. aligner.yml, aligner.wdl, etc. Calling it untitled makes it clearer I should change the name. This may not even be the place to solve it, assuming there's agreement, so ignore this, other than letting it percolate.
timeline.author: coverbeck

replies.bodyText: Agreed, but more of a general usability issue I guess.
replies.author: Ldcabansay
